channel.title: 2017-02-22 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2017-02-22 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 22 Feb 2017 00:00
item.description: 7ish miles on the regular VFW route. Had a ‘blah’ start but looked like I was doing a great pace. Probably getting back on the road after a week on the treadmill was a good push. Niggling shin pain, no cramps. No coyote sightings!
item.content:encoded: 7ish miles on the regular VFW route. Had a ‘blah’ start but looked like I was doing a great pace. Probably getting back on the road after a week on the treadmill was a good push. Niggling shin pain, no cramps. No coyote sightings!
